nodes.text: Tansarii Point Station was a space station where a battle between the Black Sun and Car'das smugglers occurred, which saw the defeat of ace pilot Talonbane Cobra. Inaldra was a boss there.

Tansarii Point Station was first canonically mentioned in the "Tansarii Point Veteran" card for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game. In Legends, the space station debuted in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, where it was situated in the Bright Jewel system.
